pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hierarchical Bayesian Vector Autoregression // Estimation of hierarchical Bayesian vector autoregressive models. Implements hierarchical prior selection for conjugate priors in the fashion of Giannone, Lenza Primiceri (2015) doi:10.1162/REST_a_00483. Functions to compute and identify impulse responses, calculate forecasts, forecast error variance decompositions and scenarios are available. Several methods to print, plot and summarise results facilitate analysis.
